mapper.select:
select r.status, room.room_id, room.title, room.price, r.reservation_id, r.member_id, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.create_date, r.adult, r.kid, r.infant from room join reservation r on room.room_id = r.room_id join payment p on r.reservation_id = p.reservation_id where room.member_id = #{memberId}
and r.status = #{status};
mapper.update: update reservation set status = 'complete' where check_out < #{today} and status = 'upcoming'
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (room_id, member_id, status, adult, kid, infant, check_in, check_out, update_target) values (#{roomId}, #{memberId}, #{status}, #{adult}, #{kid}, #{infant}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{reservationId})
mapper.select: select reservation.reservation_id, reservation.room_id, reservation.status, adult, kid, infant, check_in, check_out, room.address, room.sub_address, title, m.username, p.price, room_img.room_img from reservation join room on reservation.room_id = room.room_id join room_img on room.room_id = room_img.room_id join member m on room.member_id = m.member_id left outer join payment p on reservation.reservation_id = p.reservation_id where reservation.update_target = #{reservationId} or reservation.reservation_id = #{reservationId} and room_img_id = (select min(room_img_id) from room_img where room_img.room_id = room.room_id);

select reservation.reservation_id, reservation.room_id, reservation.status, adult, kid, infant, check_in, check_out, room.address, room.sub_address, title, m.username, p.payment_id, p.price, p.commission, room_img.room_img from reservation join room on reservation.room_id = room.room_id join room_img on room.room_id = room_img.room_id join member m on room.member_id = m.member_id join payment p on reservation.reservation_id = p.reservation_id where reservation.reservation_id = #{reservationId} and room_img_id = (select min(room_img_id) from room_img where room_img.room_id = room.room_id);
